org.apache.catalina.startup

类 LoggingBaseTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.catalina.startup.LoggingBaseTest
  • 直接已知子类:
    TestFileHandlerNonRotatable, TestGroupChannelSenderConnections, TestMapper, TestResponsePerformance, TomcatBaseTest

    public abstract class LoggingBaseTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class that provides logging support for test cases that respects the standard conf/logging.properties configuration file.

    It also provides support for cleaning up temporary files after shutdown. See addDeleteOnTearDown(File).

    Note that the logging configuration uses ${catalina.base} value and thus we take care about that property even if the tests do not use Tomcat.
